message.description: elaborates on the status. if invalid, what is invalid. if in error, what failed.

id.description: the article identifier, potentially without leading zeroes. if original request could not be parsed, a null value will be returned

token.description: data from original request to be returned to the sender once action complete. if original request could not be parsed, a null value will be returned

datetime.description: the date and time in ISO 8601 UTC when this message was sent. if 'status' is either 'ingested' or 'published', then this is the date and time recorded in lax
